attributes.action: Set less homework to allow GCSE students to revise.
attributes.additional_details: Because students are expected to revise but how are they meant to if they have not got the time due to homework set by the teachers who tell students to revise.
attributes.background: Schools set too much homework and don't allow students to revise, how are students meant to study when they are constantly bombarded by mountains of homework without a break.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637387
